mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Ann Pamela Cunningham to John Augustine Washington III, 1860 December 19
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Cunningham, Ann Pamela, 1816-1875
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from Ann Pamela Cunningham to John Augustine Washington III, December 19, 1860. Asks if he can forward the revenue from the steamboat sales to Mount Vernon as agreed upon earlier. Says she is worried about the current political climate and how it may effect their care of the estate. Wants him to know he and his family will always be welcome and have a home at Mount Vernon. Leaves for the South as soon as the weather allows.
